## Challenger example
```{r}
library(faraway)
data ( orings )
plot ( damage /6 ~ temp , orings , xlim =c(0 ,100) , ylim =c(0 ,1) ,
xlab =" temperature", ylab ="accident")
lmod <- lm( damage /6 ~ temp , orings )
abline (lmod , col =4); abline (h =0); abline (h=1)
```
